sentences.en: A daredevil parachutist jumped from the top of Tower Bridge today.
sentences.cn: 一位大胆鲁莽的跳伞者今天从伦敦塔桥的桥顶跳了下去。

sentences.en: A French daredevil climber was arrested once again after the top of a bridge overlooking Lisbon.
sentences.cn: 法国超胆侠近日在尝试攀爬葡萄牙里斯本一处著名的大桥时再次遭到葡萄牙警方的逮捕.

sentences.en: A new circus is in town, with Siberian white tigers and daredevil bikers.
sentences.cn: 镇里来了一个新的马戏团，有西伯利亚白老虎和不怕死的自行车表演客。

sentences.en: Daredevil Daisy likes the high wire, but juggler Jack prefers his feet firmly on the ground.
sentences.cn: 勇敢的戴西喜欢在空中走钢丝绳, 而喜欢杂耍的杰克却愿意双脚沾地.

sentences.en: Don't try any of those daredevil stunts.
sentences.cn: 不要耍那些天不怕地不怕的绝招.

sentences.en: He is a daredevil and never afraid of anything.
sentences.cn: 他是个胆大妄为的人,从来不怕任何事.

sentences.en: He was a daredevil when young.
He's a daredevil on the racing - track.
sentences.cn: 他在跑道上十分 胆大 鲁莽.

sentences.en: If you spent your formative years as your neighborhood's daredevil, you may be a risk lover.
sentences.cn: 如果你用你的成年期来担当邻居的“夜魔侠”, 你可能是个风险爱好者.

sentences.en: Journalist: So if I say to you , are you a daredevil, what do you say?
sentences.cn: 贾森: 是的.一想到赛车,我脸上就会笑开花, 你看到了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Oh, my God. Look at her, she's a daredevil.
sentences.cn: 哦, 天啊, 看看她, 真有不怕死的精神.

sentences.en: The daredevil was taken to a local hospital.
sentences.cn: 事后,这名勇士被送往当地医院.

sentences.en: The show's full of daredevil feats.
sentences.cn: 表演中有很多惊险的特技。

sentences.en: Why does David do these daredevil deeds?
sentences.cn: 为什么戴维做出这些胆大妄为的事情?

trans.tran_en: Daredevil people enjoy doing physically dangerous things

trans.tran_cn: 蛮勇的人，冒失鬼，胆大妄为，蛮干
